name: ShadowChess
description:
ShadowChess is a chess variant with a simple rule: you have to move twice. While the rules are similar to chess the gameplay is a bit different. Is this a simple chess game or is something more sinister lurking behind the pieces and their shadows?

Technical notes:

  • You have to click on the piece you want to move, dragging won't work
  • The game is very slow, it will take a few seconds for your opponent to move Also loading will take a bit more
  • Your opponent's replies are deterministic, the same move combination will lead to the same outcome

That's all for now.
